dat255.refugeemap.app.base

Class AppDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • dat255.refugeemap.app.base.AppDatabase

  • public class AppDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class which loads and connects a single Database instance to the rest of the application (the "GUI layer").
    Author:
    Axel

      • init

        public static void init(java.io.File filesDirectory)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the Database instance. Must be called before `getDatabaseInstance` to prevent a NullPointerException. Precondition: All arguments are non-null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDatabaseInstance

        public static Database getDatabaseInstance()
                                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Returns a reference to the created Database instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if init(File) has not been called.

      • addVisibleEventsListener

        public static void addVisibleEventsListener(AppDatabase.VisibleEventsListener l)
        Adds a listener to be notified whenever some other method calls updateVisibleEvents(List). Precondition: All arguments are non-null.

      • updateVisibleEvents

        public static void updateVisibleEvents(java.util.List<Event> newEvents)
        Updates all listeners added using addVisibleEventsListener(VisibleEventsListener). Precondition: All arguments are non-null.
